topics.body:
"@QuasarNova":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/556b80fb6368721960a72500#post_556b80fb6368721960a72500
We are done moving
I am home now, no longer required to do work
I cleaned the cat litter box, vacuumed, I put my bed sheets in the wash

I think I'm calming down now
It's just when I get stressed from working, I make myself continue to work
Sometimes at work, I'll seriously just skip breaks
Everyone goes to have a break, I tell them to go ahead, and I stay behind to keep working
I am getting work fucking done

This is more for the religion thread so I'll keep it short:

Gods are shaped by human behavior so of course they're going to act as a human would given certain scenarios. Some are easy to anger, but overall they demand recognition for their efforts and being forgotten is the worst sin you can commit towards one.

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/556b874963687256fc0f2a00#post_556b874963687256fc0f2a00
That honestly sounds too good to be true. Theres some sort of catch Isnt there?

-molly

"@Background Pony #E4FF":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/556b8b0163687201a96b0800#post_556b8b0163687201a96b0800
[bq="Background Pony #E4FF"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/556b874963687256fc0f2a00#post_556b874963687256fc0f2a00
That honestly sounds too good to be true. Theres some sort of catch Isnt there?

-molly[/bq]
Not really; technically they will still be able to spy on people *BUT* they would 100% have to get a warrant first.  The patriot act is what allows them to spy on people without a warrant; if that expires they will have to get a warrant on every person they spy on.  It wouldn't 100% kill off the nsa; more like 99.9999% kill off the nsa and the remaining 0.0001% they have a warrant.
